title: The "Iceman" Wim Hof On Health, Immunity, Anxiety Control, & Removing Depression Using Breath Work & The Cold
itunes:title: The "Iceman" Wim Hof On Health, Immunity, Anxiety Control, & Removing Depression Using Breath Work & The Cold
description:
#268: On this episode we are joined by "The Iceman", Wim Hof! For those unfamiliar with Wim Hoff, he is a Dutch extreme athlete noted for his ability to withstand freezing temperatures. He has set Guinness world records for swimming under ice and prolonged full-body contact with ice, and still holds the record for a barefoot half-marathon on ice and snow. On today's episode Wim discusses how to use the cold and breath work to boost our immune system, limit anxiety, and remove depression. 

This episode is brought to you by GOMACRO
